document_data.name: Endure Elements
document_data.mainbody: '''''Endure elements''''' was an [[abjuration]] spell that allowed the recipient to ignore normal extremes of non-magical heat or cold.
document_data.Effects: This spell lasted for 24 hours. The recipient and all they were wearing or carrying were insulated from cold or heat in the –50° F to 140° F (–46° C to 60° C) temperature range and instead perceived a comfortable temperature for the duration of the spell. ''Endure elements'' did not protect against magically generated weather, fire, cold-based attacks, smoke, suffocation, etc.
document_data.Components: Only [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s were required to cast this spell.
